game.title: Dragon's Desolation
game.description: The Dragon has ravaged the nearby village. Your mission is to track down and defeat the Dragon.
game.reward: 5000 gold coins and Legendary Dragon Slayer Sword

task.description: Search the destroyed village and nearby forest for any clues leading to Dragon's location.
Use the clues collected to track down and locate the Dragon.
Fight and defeat the Dragon to bring peace to the village.
